basics.name: Ayoub Manai
basics.label: Junior IT Consultant and Software Engineering student
basics.summary: A recently graduated ICT student with a strong passion for cybersecurity, now working as a Junior IT Consultant. I actively participate in CTF competitions and continuously seek opportunities to expand my knowledge across various cybersecurity domains. Dedicated to enhancing my skills by exploring different CTF categories and staying up to date with the latest developments in the field.

work.name: WYNSYS
work.summary: Monitored and secured Windows, Linux, and SUSE systems. Implemented NOC/SOC tools including Wazuh, OpManager, and EventLog Analyzer. Configured and maintained Sophos and Fortinet firewalls, and Cisco switches.
responsibilities: System hardening and continuous monitoring across multiple platforms
Deployment and management of Wazuh, OpManager, and EventLog Analyzer
Configuration of firewalls (Sophos, Fortinet) and Cisco network devices
Ensured compliance and identified system vulnerabilities

work.name: WYNSYS
work.summary: Configured and deployed a NOC infrastructure using ManageEngine OpManager to support WYNSYS operations. Gained hands-on experience in network monitoring, hardware maintenance, and equipment setup.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented NOC using ManageEngine OpManager
Performed hardware maintenance and system troubleshooting
Set up networking equipment and monitored infrastructure performance
Strengthened knowledge in network supervision and operational readiness

work.name: Tunisie Telecom
work.summary: Collaborated with the technical team to gain practical experience in routers, GSM, networking, and fiber optics. Developed a real-time chat website using ReactJS and Firebase.
responsibilities: Assisted in networking tasks involving routers, GSM systems, and optical fiber setup
Gained hands-on experience in network infrastructure and telecommunications
Built a live chat web application with One-to-One communication using ReactJS and Firebase
Applied frontend and backend integration techniques for real-time data sync

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

education.institution: ESPRIT - Private Higher School of Engineering and Technology
ISTIC - The Higher Institute of Information and Communications Technologies
education.area: Computer Science - Information and Communication Technologies
